title: Deborah and Barak Defeat Sisera
summary: Judges 4 tells how the prophetess Deborah and the commander Barak lead Israel to victory over King Jabin and Sisera. Sisera flees the battle and is killed by Jael, who drives a tent peg through his head.

faq.question: Who led Israel in this story?
faq.answer: Deborah, a prophetess and judge, and Barak, the military commander.

faq.question: Who killed Sisera?
faq.answer: Jael, a woman, who killed him while he was hiding in her tent.
